Package com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.controllers

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
com.CMPUT301W24T32.brazmascheckin.controllers.ImageController
public class ImageController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing image-related operations in Firebase Storage.

  • Method Details

    • uploadImage

      public void uploadImage(String TYPE, String fileID, android.net.Uri imageURI, AddSuccessListener<android.net.Uri> successListener, AddFailureListener failureListener)
      Uploads an image to Firebase Storage based on the specified type and file ID.
      Parameters:
      TYPE - the type of image to be upload.
      fileID - the ID of the file.
      imageURI - the URI of the image to upload.
      successListener - a listener to handle success callbacks for the operation.
      failureListener - a listener to handle failure callbacks for the operation.

    • uploadQRCode

      public void uploadQRCode(String type, String fileID, byte[] imageData, AddSuccessListener<android.net.Uri> successListener, AddFailureListener failureListener)
      Parameters:
      fileID - the ID of the file.
      imageData - the byte array of image data.
      successListener - a listener to handle success callbacks for the operation.
      failureListener - a listener to handle failure callbacks for the operation.

    • getImage

      public void getImage(String TYPE, String fileID, GetSuccessListener<byte[]> successListener, AddFailureListener failureListener)
      Parameters:
      TYPE - the type of image to retrieve (e.g., EVENT_POSTER, PROFILE_PICTURE, QR_CODE).
      fileID - the ID of the file.
      successListener - a listener to handle success callbacks for the operation.
      failureListener - a listener to handle failure callbacks for the operation.

    • getImageURL

      public void getImageURL(String TYPE, String fileID, GetSuccessListener<String> successListener, AddFailureListener failureListener)
      Retrieves the URL of an image from Firebase Storage based on the specified type and file ID.
      Parameters:
      TYPE - the type of image to retrieve.
      fileID - the ID of the file.
      successListener - a listener to handle success callbacks for the operation.
      failureListener - a listener to handle failure callbacks for the operation.

    • deleteImage

      public void deleteImage(String TYPE, String fileID, DeleteSuccessListener successListener, DeleteFailureListener failureListener)
      Deletes an image from Firebase Storage based on the specified type and file ID.
      Parameters:
      TYPE - the type of image to delete (e.g., EVENT_POSTER, PROFILE_PICTURE, QR_CODE).
      fileID - the ID of the file.
      successListener - a listener to handle success callbacks for the operation.
      failureListener - a listener to handle failure callbacks for the operation.

    • getAllQRCodeFileIDs

      public void getAllQRCodeFileIDs(GetSuccessListener<List<String>> listener)
      This method retrieves the file IDs of all QR Codes stored in Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      listener - to handle success of providing a list of file IDs.

    • getAllProfilePicFileIDs

      public void getAllProfilePicFileIDs(GetSuccessListener<List<String>> listener)
      This method retrieves the file IDs of all profile pictures stored in Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      listener - to handle success of providing a list of file IDs.

    • getAllPosterFileIDs

      public void getAllPosterFileIDs(GetSuccessListener<List<String>> listener)
      This method retrieves the file IDs of all event posters stored in Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      listener - to handle success of providing a list of file IDs.
